dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 9294 IH: To amend the Claims Resolution Act to make a technical correction to the Taos Pueblo Water Development Fund and the Aamodt Settlement Pueblos’ Fund, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Leger Fernandez introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Claims Resolution Act to make a technical correction to the Taos Pueblo Water Development Fund and the Aamodt Settlement Pueblos’ Fund, and for other purposes.

section.header: Authorization of payment of adjusted interest on the Taos Pueblo Water Development Fund
section.text: Section 509(c)(1) of the Claims Resolution Act (Public Law 111–291) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: In addition to the amounts made available under subparagraphs (A) and (B), there is authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary for deposit into the Taos Pueblo Water Development Fund $7,794,297.52.

section.header: Authorization of payment of adjusted interest on the Aamodt Settlement Pueblos’ fund
section.text: Section 617(c)(1) of the Claims Resolution Act (Public Law 111–291) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: In addition to amounts made available subparagraphs (A) and (B), there is authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary $4,314,709.18 to further assist the Pueblos in accordance with subparagraph (B).
